item.title: 317 Delta problem
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

StormpkScape:

what file is it in?

It should be in the client class since you use delta, although I moved mine to another class, yours should look similar to this:

[code=java] if (c.playerRights != 2 && c.playerRights != 3 && c.action != 1 && c.deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.deathTimer >= 2500)
{
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[c.KillerId];

			youDied();
			killerz.sendMessage("You have defeated "+c.playerName+".");
		}		
		if (c.deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.deathTimer >= 2500) 
		{
			c.toX = 3225+misc.random(1);
			c.toY = 3218+misc.random(1);
			c.AtkPray = 0;
			c.StrPrayer = 0;
			c.DefPray = 0;
			c.RangePray = 0;
			c.MagePray = 0;
			c.PrayHeal = false;
			c.ProtItem = false;
			c.ProtMage = false;
			c.ProtRange = false;
			c.ProtMelee = false;
			c.Redemption = false;
			c.Retribution = false;
			c.Smite = false;
			c.Chivalry = false;
			c.Piety = false;
			c.isSkulled = false;
			c.lastSkull = 0;
			c.headIcon = 0;
			c.turnpray();
			c.heightLevel = 0;
			c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
			c.deathStage = 0;
			c.resetAnimation();
			c.frame1();
			c.prayOn = false;
			c.sendMessage("Oh dear you have died!");
        			c.resetOtherAtk();[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“StormpkScape, post:5, topic:386856”]is it this?

public void dealDamage(int amt) { ((client) this).debug("Dealing " + amt + " damage to you (hp=" + currentHealth + ")"); currentHealth -= amt; if (currentHealth <= 0) { ((client) this).debug("Triggering death timer"); currentHealth = 0; deathStage = 1; deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { /* * if(amt == 0){ if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == -1){ pEmote = 404; } * else { pEmote = 403; } } */ } }[/quote]
No… I previously stated it was in the process method; hold on I’ll find mine.
